channel.title: Aurora Orchestra Plays Shostakovich's Fifth
channel.desc: An immersive memorised performance brings this 20th-century masterpiece to life.

channel.title: Frederick Delius
channel.desc: How Eric Fenby helped a blind Delius set down the unfinished scores he heard in his head.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Delius
channel.desc: Documentary exploring the contradictions of Frederick Delius's colourful life, a man who forged his own musical language with which he tried to capture the pleasure of the moment.

channel.title: Victoria Wood
